body: SUPPLEMENTARY FIG. S2. Expression of SMN protein in cortex, spinal cord, and kidney in adult SMA mice with 6 weekly doses of 10 mg/kg. Westerns were quantified on a LI-COR Odyssey Ò FC imager and analyzed with Image Studio Ô software. SMA, spinal muscular atrophy; SMN, survival motor neuron. The asterick indicates a p value of < 5 · 10-4.
